# NSAccessibilityLoadingToken

**Type Alias**

A token type for loading accessibility elements.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias NSAccessibilityLoadingToken = any NSSecureCoding & NSObjectProtocol
```

## Supporting Accessibility

- **accessibilityElement(withToken:)**: Loads the target accessibility element with the specified load token.
- **accessibilityRangeInTargetElement(withToken:)**: Returns the range that specifies the area of interest in text-based accessibility elements with the specified load token.

items.description: Loads the target accessibility element with the specified load token.
